SPM12 must be installed to compile the Matlab code, but is not needed to run 
the compiled code and are not included in the code repository or in the container.

SPM12 (r7771)
    LICENCE_SPM12.txt
    https://www.fil.ion.ucl.ac.uk/spm/
    https://www.fil.ion.ucl.ac.uk/spm/download/restricted/eldorado/spm12.zip

Installing SPM12:
   1. Unzip spm12.zip
